summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West 62nd Street, from Sycamore Avenue to 3rd Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7703 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
